description: Creates a data quality ruleset with DQDL rules applied to a specified Glue table. You create the ruleset using the Data Quality Definition Language (DQDL). For more information, see the Glue developer guide.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: A unique name for the data quality ruleset.

parameters.name: Ruleset
parameters.description: A Data Quality Definition Language (DQDL) ruleset. For more information, see the Glue developer guide.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tags applied to the data quality ruleset. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: TargetTable
parameters.description: A target table associated with the data quality ruleset. The name of the Glue table. The name of the database where the Glue table exists. CatalogId (string) --- The catalog id where the Glue table exists.

nested_params.name: TableName
nested_params.description: The name of the Glue table.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: The name of the database where the Glue table exists.

nested_params.name: CatalogId
nested_params.description: The catalog id where the Glue table exists.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A unique name for the data quality ruleset.
